name: A Hamilton Adventure
description:
Play as Alexander Hamilton in a short quest, based on the Hamilton musical by Lin-Manuel Miranda. Situated between Alexander's entry into the military and his ascension to Washington's assistant, explore British-occupied New York and the people who live there as you assist the Patriot cause.

This project is based on Cassandra Pybus' article, "Mary Perth, Harry Washington, and Moses Wilkinson: Black Methodists Who Escaped from Slavery and Founded a Nation," in the monograph Revolutionary Founders, edited by Alfred F. Young, Gary B. Nash, and Ray Raphael, and published by Vintage Books (New York, 2011).

For further reading, check out The Counter-Revolution of 1776: Slave Resistance and the Origins of the United States of America by Gerald Horne and published by New York University Press (New York, 2014). Also, check out The Common Cause: Creating Race and Nation in the American Revolution, by Robert G. Parkinson and published by University of North Carolina Press (Williamsburg, 2016).
